idea-plugin.name: Window Layout Manager
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin provides multi layout support for the IntelliJ based IDE of your choice. You can store up to four layouts with a meaningful name.
Plugin is accessible via Window Menu:
  • Store Layout: Stores the current window layout
  • Restore Layout: Restores the selected layout immediately
Feel free to contribute at GitHub.
